subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
Computers and the Internet
Book Trade and Publishing
lead_paragraph: Derek Jeter, who gave guarded answers to the news media during his playing career, said he would publish The Players’ Tribune, giving sports stars a way to express themselves without a filter.
snippet: Derek Jeter, who gave guarded answers to the news media during his playing career, said he would publish The Players’ Tribune, giving sports stars a way to express themselves without a filter.
